word: When Joseph and Mary found Jesus, they were amazed, \93and his mother said unto him, Son, why hast thou thus dealt with us? behold, thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing. And he said unto them, How is it that ye sought me?\94 Pointing heavenward, He continued, \93Wist ye not that I must be about my Father\92s business?\94 As He spoke these words, divinity flashed through humanity. The light and glory of heaven illuminated His countenance. . . .
